user_id.description: The ID of the user associated with the expense

user_name.description: The name of the user associated with the expense

is_contractor.description: Indicates if the user is a contractor

total_amount.description: The total amount of the expense

billable_amount.description: The amount that can be billed for the expense

currency.description: The currency in which the expense is incurred

from.description: The start date of the expense

to.description: The end date of the expense
